org.easybatch.jdbc

Class JdbcRecordMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.mapper.AbstractRecordMapper
      • org.easybatch.jdbc.JdbcRecordMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordMapper<JdbcRecord,GenericRecord>, RecordProcessor<JdbcRecord,GenericRecord>

    public class JdbcRecordMapper
extends AbstractRecordMapper
implements RecordMapper<JdbcRecord,GenericRecord>
    A RecordMapper that maps database rows to domain objects.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Constructor Detail

      • JdbcRecordMapper

        public JdbcRecordMapper(java.lang.Class recordClass)
        Constructs a default JdbcRecordMapper instance. Column names will be fetched from the jdbc result set meta data and set to fields with the same name of the target object.
        Parameters:
        recordClass - the target domain object class

      • JdbcRecordMapper

        public JdbcRecordMapper(java.lang.Class recordClass,
                java.lang.String... fields)
        Constructs a JdbcRecordMapper. The supplied field names will be used to map columns to the target object fields.
        Parameters:
        recordClass - the target domain object class
        fields - the list of fields names

    • Method Detail

      • processRecord

        public GenericRecord processRecord(JdbcRecord record)
                            throws RecordMappingException
        Description copied from interface: RecordMapper
        Map the record to a GenericRecord having a domain object as payload.
        Specified by:
        processRecord in interface RecordMapper<JdbcRecord,GenericRecord>
        Specified by:
        processRecord in interface RecordProcessor<JdbcRecord,GenericRecord>
        Parameters:
        record - the record to map.
        Returns:
        a GenericRecord having a domain object as payload
        Throws:
        RecordMappingException - if an error occurs during record mapping
